amendment.description: Amendment requires the General Accounting Office to conduct a comprehensive analysis and evaluation regarding the performance of the Office of Juvenile Justice Delinquency and Prevention.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 43 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to require a GAO analysis regarding the performance of juvenile justice delinquency and prevention programs and establishes a sunset date for those programs that are not effective.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schaffer amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 60 (Roll no. 230).
